summary.span: Represents an individual cell in a control.

span.span: Represents an individual cell in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示中的单个单元格控件。The class represents an individual cell in a control. 您可以检索到的单元格的集合。You can retrieve cells through the collection of a . 行和列标识中的单元格的位置。The row and column for a identify the cell's location in the . 典型的单元格包含特定于行和列包含它的数据。A typical cell contains data specific to the row and column in which it is contained. 该单元格可以多种方式通过设置其属性和处理与它关联的事件自定义。The cell can be customized in a number of ways by setting its properties and handling the events associated with it. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。The following code example illustrates the use of this type. 有关此示例的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单个单元格添加工具提示](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/add-tooltips-to-individual-cells-in-a-wf-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about this example, see [How to: Add ToolTips to Individual Cells in a Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/add-tooltips-to-individual-cells-in-a-wf-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText/cpp/datagridviewcell.tooltiptext.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText/CS/datagridviewcell.tooltiptext.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText/VB/datagridviewcell.tooltiptext.vb#1)]

span.para: 派生自并将新属性添加到派生类，请确保重写方法以在克隆操作过程中复制新属性。此外应调用基类的方法，以便基类的属性复制到新的单元格。

When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations. You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单元格的默认宽度是边框的一个像素。The default width of the cell border is one pixel. 使用以下值可修改边框的宽度：Use the following values to modify the width of the border: - 值表示 0 像素的宽度。The value denotes a width of 0 pixels. - 或值增加 1 个像素的默认宽度。The or values increase the default width by 1 pixel. 此外，如果属性设置为所属单元格的行，矩形的高度的值将增加。In addition, if the property is set for the cell's owning row, the rectangle's height is increased by the value of . 如果属性设置为单元格所属的列，矩形的宽度将增加的值。If the property is set for the cell's owning column, the rectangle's width will be increased by the value of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法的类来确定在单元格中可用的绘图区域。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method of the class to determine the available drawing area in a cell. 此代码示例摘自[如何： 禁用 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的按钮列中的按钮](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/disable-buttons-in-a-button-column-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Disable Buttons in a Button Column in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/disable-buttons-in-a-button-column-in-the-datagrid.md). summary.span: Gets or sets the shortcut menu associated with the cell.

span.span: Gets or sets the shortcut menu associated with the cell.

value.span: 单元格相关联。

span.span: The associated with the cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示在用户右键单击该单元格时通常会显示的快捷菜单。This property indicates the shortcut menu that is typically displayed when the user right-clicks the cell. 当控件属性设置或其属性是`true`，获取的值属性将引发控件的事件，并返回的值为属性指定在事件处理程序。When the control property is set or its property is `true`, getting the value of the property raises the event of the control and returns the value of the property as specified in the event handler. 如果没有为事件处理程序，则获取的值属性返回以前指定的值或其默认值为`null`。If there are no handlers for the event, getting the value of the property returns the previously specified value or its default value of `null`. 处理事件时，可以主要使用大量的数据以避免性能损失，设置单元格时多个单元格的值。Handling the event is primarily useful when working with large amounts of data to avoid performance penalties when setting the cell value for multiple cells. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 更改此属性将引发对所具有的事件，如果存在一个。Changing this property raises the event on the owning , if one exists. 您还可以指定快捷菜单，为各个行而不是通过设置行的各个单元格属性或处理控件的事件。You can also specify shortcut menus for individual rows rather than individual cells by setting the row property or handling the control's event. 该单元格属性设置将覆盖该行属性设置，并事件替代这两事件和行属性设置。The cell property setting overrides the row property setting, and the event overrides both the event and the row property setting. 您可以指定`null`为单元格快捷菜单，但是，若要防止被覆盖的行的快捷菜单。You can specify `null` for a cell shortcut menu, however, to prevent a row shortcut menu from being overridden.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件调用此方法将单元格的值转换为所指示的类型的等效显示值属性。The control calls this method to convert a cell value into an equivalent display value of the type indicated by the property. 该控件将单元格的值传递给此方法`value`参数。The control passes the cell value to this method in the `value` parameter. 此方法将引发事件。This method raises the event. 此事件的处理程序可以修改这两`value`和`cellStyle`参数。A handler for this event can modify both the `value` and `cellStyle` parameters. 如果未设置该处理程序不会属性设置为`true`，但是，此方法设置`value`使用的格式设置属性`cellStyle`对象。If the handler does not set the property to `true`, however, this method formats `value` using the formatting properties of the `cellStyle` object. > [!NOTE] > 此方法不转换`value`到属性值的值等于属性值时设置为一个值，而不或`null`。This method does not convert `value` to the property value for values equal to the property value when is set to a value other than or `null`. 在这种情况下，可以处理事件，以显示属性值。In this case, you can handle the event to display the property value. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的代码示例。For more information, see the code example in . 如果格式设置不成功，事件发生。If formatting is unsuccessful, the event occurs. 如果此事件或处理程序集没有处理程序属性设置为`true`，将引发异常。If there is no handler for this event or the handler sets the property to `true`, an exception is thrown. 重写此方法的派生的类通常会返回单元格的值的字符串表示形式，如果`context`自变量包含值。Derived classes that override this method will typically return a string representation of the cell value if the `context` argument includes the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为一项优化技术，通常所有单元格的相同类型和相同共享单个寄宿的编辑控件。As an optimization technique, typically all the cells of the same type and in the same share a single hosted editing control. 但是，该控件使用的单元格之前，它需要由初始化方法。However, before the control is used by a cell, it needs to be initialized by the method. 第一次调用时，则此方法会将控件添加到列表中其父级的编辑控件。The first time it is called, this method adds the control to the list of editing controls in its parent . 它还可以初始化一些单元格的可视属性。It also initializes some of the visual properties of the cell. 例如，设置要与提供的单元格样式参数匹配的编辑区域的背景色。For example, sets the background color of the editing area to match the supplied cell style parameter. 对后续调用不执行任何操作。Subsequent calls to do nothing. 派生的类使用此方法可以托管的一个实例它们的类型相对应的类。Derived classes use this method to host an instance of the class corresponding to their type. 例如，包含一个或多个表对象调用此方法来添加单个编辑控件具有所有权的。For example, a table that contains one or more objects calls this method to add a single editing control to the owning . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写派生的简单类中方法类。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a simple class that derives from the class. 此示例中提供一个更大的代码示例摘自[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 单元格中的宿主控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md)。This example is part of a larger code example provided in [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户编辑单元格的值，并提交更改，控件将调用此方法将从显示的值到。When the user edits a cell value and commits the change, the control calls this method to convert the displayed value from the to the . 控件然后将设置为转换后的值的基础单元格的值或数据源值。The control then sets the underlying cell value or data source value to the converted value. 此方法的默认实现将分析`formattedValue`参数使用， ，和单元格样式的属性由`cellStyle`参数。The default implementation of this method parses the `formattedValue` parameter using the , , and properties of the cell style indicated by the `cellStyle` parameter. 如果`formattedValue`等同于，此方法返回的值属性或`null`如果是和单元格是引用类型。If `formattedValue` is equal to , this method returns the value of the property or `null` if is and the cell is a reference type. 如果`formattedValue`不等于，此方法分析`formattedValue`使用属性和指定或默认的转换器。If `formattedValue` is not equal to , this method parses `formattedValue` using the property and the specified or default converters. 如果该单元格是可以为 null，此方法会包装返回的值作为类型。If the cell is nullable, this method wraps the return value as a type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一些类派生自类，如，主机控件中选定的单元格。Some classes derived from the class, such as , host a control in the selected cell. 方法定位编辑控件，是承载单元格。The method positions the editing control inside of the host cell. 编辑控件可能会占用更多的空间比单个单元格，因为它可能需要编辑第一个可见行的第一个可见列中的单元格，因此不会绘制之外时以不同的方式定位。Because the editing control may take up more space than a single cell, it may need to be positioned differently when editing a cell in the first visible column or first visible row so it does not paint outside the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当鼠标指针位于单元格上且属性值不是，此属性的值显示为工具提示的单元格。The value of this property is displayed as the cell ToolTip when the mouse pointer is over the cell and the property value is not . 如果此属性的值为、 单元格将显示工具提示包含的单元格的值，如果值为单元格显示被截断; 否则为该单元格将不会显示工具提示。If the value of this property is , the cell will display a ToolTip containing the value of the cell if the value is truncated in the cell display; otherwise, the cell will not display a ToolTip. 您还可以通过设置阻止的工具提示显示属性设置为`false`。You can also prevent the display of a ToolTip by setting the property to `false`. 当控件属性设置或其属性是`true`，获取的值属性将引发控件的事件，并返回的值为属性指定在事件处理程序。When the control property is set or its property is `true`, getting the value of the property raises the event of the control and returns the value of the property as specified in the event handler. 如果没有为事件处理程序，则获取的值属性返回以前指定的值或其默认值为。If there are no handlers for the event, getting the value of the property returns the previously specified value or its default value of . 处理事件时，可以主要使用大量的数据以避免性能损失，设置单元格时多个单元格的值。Handling the event is primarily useful when working with large amounts of data to avoid performance penalties when setting the cell value for multiple cells. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 更改此属性将引发对所具有的事件，如果存在一个。Changing this property raises the event on the owning , if one exists. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置内的事件处理程序属性事件。The following code example shows how to set the property within an event handler for the event. 此示例中提供一个更大的代码示例摘自[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单个单元格添加工具提示](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/add-tooltips-to-individual-cells-in-a-wf-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger code example provided in [How to: Add ToolTips to Individual Cells in a Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/add-tooltips-to-individual-cells-in-a-wf-datagridview-control.md).
